metadata.title: CVE-2020-15863 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: hw/net/xgmac.c in the XGMAC Ethernet controller in QEMU before 07-20-2020has a buffer overflow. This occurs during packet transmission and affectsthe highbank and midway emulated machines. A guest user or process coulduse this flaw to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denialof service or potential privileged code execution. This was fixed in commit5519724a13664b43e225ca05351c60b4468e4555.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
